Thanks for the upload but...

This guy is just another doomsayer or whiner, depending on where you're from. He pulls numbers out of his ass about how many barrels of oil there is in a given location like he's some sort of f*cking geology expert. Then the next minute he admits that no one knows exactly how much oil there is. What an ass.

He has been preaching doom since the mid-1980s and now he claims he's right. It only took 25 YEARS for him to be right!

These guys are a dime a dozen. I know. I've listened to a bunch of them before and wasted money on them and their stupid advice. Only this guy somehow conned someone to film him.

Shit. I claim the economy will come back in 25 years. You heard it here first! Remember what I said!
